message:
SYSTEM: ISSGC08.pdf: Página 17
©<Miembro Grupo>
18
Execution & Job management
• Initiating/submitting, monitoring and managing jobs
– Translate job to the target system language, submit the job, get the job 
status, cache the job if something goes wrong, etc.
• Handling and organizing all the job data
– Manage the job data (internal directories, intermediate data used by the 
jobs, etc.). All these data is preserved/organized after the successful job 
completion.
• Coordinating and scheduling jobs
– Coordinate workflow resources, manage the initiation of the workflow 
execution, monitor the workflow, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
